title: [Massive] Science Teachers' Instructional Styles and Student Intrinsic Motivation Enhancement Process Using the 5Es Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and possession of basic laboratory skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, focusing on practical projects applicable to science education settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more lesson designs applying the five stages (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) of the 5Es instructional model
Learners can write a project report analyzing the impact of science teaching styles on students' intrinsic motivation
Learners can complete a science experiment project with over 80% completion rate incorporating peer feedback in a small-scale PBL environment

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)
Open Datasets Related to Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
